details.body:
Helpline providing free advice to businesses on how they can reduce energy costs. The helpline can deal with straightforward requests for information to in-depth technical questions about particular technologies. It provides:

  • immediate answers to the majority of questions
  • arrangements for a specialist to call back for questions needing further information
  • distribution of free publications relevant to each enquiry
